explains: n. 新信徒，新入教者；初学者，新手；新受圣职的司铎

sentences.en: So how does the neophyte collector find his or her way through this jungle?
sentences.cn: 收藏新手们如何在这重重森林中找对路子呢？

sentences.en: Idea generation values a neophyte perspective; vision building is based on research and deep understanding.
sentences.cn: 创意提供了全新的视角，而愿景建设依靠研究和深刻理解。

sentences.en: This month, I introduce a neophyte framework that makes great strides toward easing the pain of testing GUIs.
sentences.cn: 本月，我将介绍一种新的框架，它极大地减轻了GUI测试的痛苦。
